title: Mision de San Antonio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run Mexican restaurant with a drive-thru. Has a menu section for vegetarian and vegan items. Faux meat and vegetables to add onto enchiladas, floutas, dinner plates. Around 10 different sides including refried beans without lard and soy bean tortillas. A couple vegan soups. Sells soy milk, soy horchata, and soy meat in bulk. Caters for local veg group meetup. Happy hours margaritas. Some drinks contain honey.
